p:
We found the same conclusions can be made looking at the other performance measure Φ
A , however, these results are more affected by characteristics of the network data. To test the robustness of our results we repeated the analysis using 3 and 10 sentinels (instead of 5) and found nothing that disagreed with the results as they are presented here. The corresponding figures for both sampling methods, performance measures, and number of sentinels, can be found in S5– S16 Figs.
